'''Donna Bevell''' is the mother of [[Greg Bevell]].

==History==
Donna came to the hospital with her son, Greg, who had a large brain tumor. Derek proposed a surgical plan which involved splitting Greg's face open. Donna opposed the idea, but was able to be convinced. After his surgery, Greg was in a lot of pain, but Derek assured Donna that it was a healing pain and meant that they had won.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Her son, Greg, had a large brain tumor that had to be removed.
